                             Theme: Business and Employment

IT system: Remote access to the E&A company network

       E&A is a company with its head office in Curitiba, Brazil. The company has grown in the
       last few years, and most of its 50 employees are spending large amounts of time working
       away from the company’s head office, either at their clients’ offices, building sites or from
       their own homes.

   5   Each E&A employee has been provided with a laptop that has remote access to files
       stored on the company’s network. When meeting a client, employees are able to view
       the designs being discussed as a PDF on the company network but they are not able to
       make changes to these designs in real time. This means they have limited access to the
       company’s resources when they are working away from the head office.

  10   Elisa de Souza, the Chief Technical Officer, has been asked to provide a range of possible
       solutions to ensure that when employees are working away from the head office, they
       have access to the specialized design software and other resources that are held on the
       E&A company network.

       Elisa hopes that the solutions found will also minimize other challenges faced by
  15   employees while working away from the head office, such as dealing with connectivity
       problems and making sure that the changes requested by clients on the PDF versions of
       designs are updated on the E&A network.
